column2: "/ci2 2 We were destined to meet here-tuna! Leader, fight with me-tuna! Agito's so quiet and boring-tuna."
"/ci3 2 It's over-tuna! Good thing I was looking out for you-tuna! You'd have got lost in no time, looking for Orochi-whatever-tuna!"
"Uh-oh, Mr. Fishy's at his limit too-tuna. I'm sorry, but I really need to leave-tuna... Leader, Agito, I'm retreating-tuna!"

"Oh, I can see the sea-tuna...
Goodnight, Mr. Fishy-tuna..."
"Even if Agito falls down, the rest of us will finish it-tuna! That's what allies are for-tuna!"
